title: Hiroshima Xiang
description: Chinese name 広香素食坊, address 台北市 北投區光明路132之8號隔壁. Buddhist restaurant, no onion or garlic. Wide range of dishes. Try the mapo tofu. A clear soup is served with all dishes. As of July 2013, plates cost NT70. Directions: From Xinbeitou station follow WenQuan Road past Yoshinoya, continue on road but cross to the left side where you pass by a few dental and medical clinics. Restaurant is on the second side street two shops down from the corner. Look for the big red and white vegetarian sign.
